Title: Mirrors
Overview: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.
Tagline: There is evil...On the other side.
production_companies: Regency Enterprises, Castel Film Romania, ASAF, New Regency Pictures, Luna Pictures
Cast: Kiefer Sutherland, Paula Patton, Amy Smart
